title: Ep270 London Crimes
description:
This week, the gals dig out their passports and head to the Square Mile City. Topics include Jerry Springer's birth story, some very weird prison protocols, and a nightmarish lair. Mix some Baileys into your London Fog tea, keep track of your coffin, and tune in for London Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
